argument.description: Is the name of the data type.
Is the type of information to be returned for the data type. property can be one of the following values.

description: Returns information about a data type.
sample:
SELECT TYPEPROPERTY(SCHEMA_NAME(schema_id) + '.' + name, 'OwnerId') AS owner_id, name, system_type_id, user_type_id, schema_id  
FROM sys.types;
